navbarbar.maps: Cliquez sur la carte pour bénéficier d'une meilleure expérience
navbarbar.paragraph1: Use your mobile app to book a ride now or schedule one for later by selecting a specific date and time. You can also call or email us and we will be happy to assist you
navbarbar.paragraph6:
Are you interested in our services? Would you like to inform us ofyour questions or suggestions? Do you want to contact us regarding any of your problems or complaints?
Please fill out this form and we will contact you shortly.
navbar.title: navbar - Taxi Reservation
navbar.question1: How can I book a taxi?
navbar.answer1: You can book a taxi using our online reservation form, by calling our customer service or by using our mobile application.
navbar.question2: What types of vehicles are available for reservation?
navbar.answer2: We offer a wide range of vehicles to meet all your needs, including sedans, minivans, and luxury cars.
navbar.answer3: Yes, you can cancel your reservation at any time. However, cancellation fees may apply depending on the timing of the cancellation.
navbar.question4: How can I pay for my reservation?
navbar.answer4: We accept payments by credit card, PayPal, and bank transfer.
navbar.question5: Are there any additional fees for late bookings?
navbar.answer5: Additional fees may apply for bookings made late at night or early in the morning. Please contact our customer service for more information.
navbar.map: Boost your Taxi Business in Geneva. Take on-the-go rides with TaxiFy
navbar.installText: Install our TaxiFyDriver driver application now!
navbar.taxify_fee: The TaxiFy fee is deducted directly from your TaxiFy account
